file_content.text: Just in time. We were, ahem, about to start without you....
If you think the prospect of killing a woman bothers me, think again. She is, after all, not a lady.
Pathetic. This vile-looking offworlder was the best champion you could find?
Ah, House Teraan's "champion" finally arrives. Is this common thug truly the best you people could do?
He can't hold a blaster with no arms.
Silence your vile pet or I'll have it sent to the zoo.
Bowdaar's my friend. The only thing that belongs in a zoo here is you.
He's not my pet, you scum.
Yes, I imagine someone like you has difficulty finding friends of your own species.
Keep your howls to yourself, Wookiee.
Shut it, Bowdaar.
This fight is yours.
Nice robes, pal. Sew them yourself?
Inform your simple-minded servant he should not speak. I have no compunction about killing your "second" first.
Your fight's with me, Xin. And I think your robes look stupid, too.
Leave Corso alone.
He looks like rancor droppings bundled in shimmersilk.
"Simple-minded servant"--he's got you pegged, Corso.
That was pretty funny.
I'll be sure to rush you to a kolto tank next time you lose a fight.
Even for a mercenary, you're absolutely repugnant. Where exactly did you acquire that stench?
I'm pretty sure it was at your castle.
Your home.
The question was rhetorical.
You must be the vermin who invaded my family's home and stole our property.
You've saved me the trouble of hunting down and executing you.
I do pride myself on convenience.
That was nice of me, huh?
I pride myself on killing.
I didn't save you anything, pal.
You smug idiot. [Attack.]
Quit while you can.
Oh, I'll last a lot longer than that--but you won't.
Draw!
Let's fight! [Shoot Xin]
Agh! You... filthy mongrel! How dare you violate the rules of noble combat? The duel hadn't even started!
As you pointed out, I'm not a noble.
This isn't noble combat.
I'm going to enjoy killing you.
What about now?
Sorry. [Shoot Xin]
Stop! Stop, blast you! The duel is ended. You win!
Leave House Teraan alone, understand?
Go, and don't come back.
They're not worth another moment of my time.
You're sure I can't go for three?
Already?
Enough! You've made your point.
I can't believe you shot me without waiting for the duel to start. Twice!
This duel was to the death, remember?
Not yet. [Attack]
You're an idiot. [Attack]
Get away from me.
I was busting this guy out of jail on Coruscant, and... oh, never mind.
It's a long story.
Are we gonna fight, you over-dressed son of a nerf-herder?
Hurry up and duel, already.
Tsk, tsk. Such vulgarity. But what else should I expect from a common thief?
How rude.
